sampleUtterances: How do I get technical help at UC?
Where do I find UC IT support?
Can you help me contact IT help desk?
I need help with UC network or portal access.
What IT support services are available?
closingResponse:
🖥️ UC IT Support Services — University of the Cumberlands
👉 For general issues, visit the IT Help Desk portal or email: it@ucumberlands.edu
👉 Phone: 606-539-4197
👉 Need help with iLearn or Canvas? Email: ilearn@ucumberlands.edu or call: 877-633-9146
👉 For Wi-Fi access, connect to “UC-PATRIOT-WIFI” and register your device at ucumberlands.edu/devices
👉 For remote desktop assistance, visit Remote Assistance
👉 Campus tech support is available in the Luecker Building basement:
• Sunday: 3 PM–Midnight
• Mon–Thu: 8 AM–Midnight
• Friday: 8 AM–Noon

sampleUtterances: How do I reset my UC password?
I forgot my password; how do I change it?
How to set up my UC student account?
Can you help me restore my password?
How do I create a new University of the Cumberlands login?
closingResponse: 🔐 UC Account & Password Assistance 👉 To reset your password, visit the UC Account Sign-Up / Reset page and select “Student Candidate.” Enter your A-number, birth city, and birth year, then click “Submit.” Proceed to set a new password — must be 8–20 characters long and include: • Uppercase • Lowercase • Number • Special character. Once submitted, your password syncs across: • Student portal • Campus email • Google • Canvas • myUC services. 📩 If you’ve never received an account, visit the Account Sign-Up form 📬 Still need help? Email: it@ucumberlands.edu or visit the IT Help Desk in Luecker Building basement 🕒 Support Hours: • Sunday: 3 PM–Midnight • Mon–Thu: 8 AM–Midnight • Friday: 8 AM–Noon

🤖 I'm sorry, I didn't quite get that. Could you please rephrase your question?
You can ask about:
👉 Course registration (Fall, Spring, Summer)
👉 Class schedules
👉 IT support
👉 Password reset
👉 Library services and more.

sampleUtterances: When can I register for Summer 2026?
What’s the last day to enroll in summer classes?
Is late registration allowed in summer term?
Tell me the Summer 2026 registration deadline.
When does Summer class registration close?
closingResponse:
📚 Summer 2026 Course Registration — University of the Cumberlands
👉 Summer registration generally opens in early April 2026
👉 Registration usually closes just before the first day of classes: May 4, 2026
👉 All add/drop or enrollment updates should be completed before May 4
👉 Use the MyUC student portal to register and view course availability
👉 For questions, email registrar@ucumberlands.edu or call (606) 539‑4316.

sampleUtterances: When does Fall 2025 registration open?
What is the last date to register for Fall 2025?
Can I still register for Fall classes?
Fall registration deadline?
When is UC Fall course registration?
closingResponse:
📚 Fall 2025 Course Registration — University of the Cumberlands
👉 Fall registration typically opens mid‑June 2025
👉 Enrollment remains available up until the first day of classes: August 25, 2025
👉 You must finalize course selections and complete any add/drop actions before August 25
👉 Register early through your MyUC student portal to secure preferred classes
👉 For assistance or questions, contact the Registrar’s Office at registrar@ucumberlands.edu or (606) 539‑4316

sampleUtterances: When does Spring 2026 registration open?
What is the last day to register for Spring 2026?
How late can I enroll in Spring classes?
Tell me Spring 2026 registration cutoff.
When does registration for Spring 2026 close?
closingResponse:
📚 Spring 2026 Course Registration — University of the Cumberlands
👉 Spring registration typically opens in late November 2025
👉 You can register up until the first day of classes: January 12, 2026
👉 Add/drop actions must be completed before January 12
👉 Use your MyUC student portal to register early and avoid missing spots
👉 Need help? Contact registrar@ucumberlands.edu or call (606) 539‑4316

sampleUtterances: When does Summer 2026 semester start?
What holidays are in Summer 2026?
When are Summer 2026 finals?
When is Juneteenth in summer term?
What’s the final exam week for Summer 2026?
closingResponse:
📅 Summer 2026 Term — University of the Cumberlands
👉 Classes begin on May 4, 2026
👉 University closed for Memorial Day on May 25, 2026
👉 University closed for Juneteenth on June 19, 2026
👉 University closed for Independence Day on July 3, 2026
👉 Last day of classes: August 14, 2026
👉 Graduation date: August 15, 2026 (ceremony held in May) 🎓

sampleUtterances: When does Spring 2026 start?
Tell me Spring 2026 class dates
Spring 2026 semester schedule please
When are Spring 2026 finals?
What’s the Spring 2026 calendar?
closingResponse:
📅 Spring 2026 Semester — University of the Cumberlands
👉 Classes begin on January 12, 2026
👉 University closed for Martin Luther King Jr. Day on January 19, 2026
👉 Midterm grades due by February 27, 2026
👉 Spring Break: March 2–6, 2026
👉 University closed on April 3, 2026 (Good Friday)
👉 Last day of classes: April 24, 2026
👉 Final exams: April 27–May 1, 2026
👉 Commencement/Hooding: May 1, with graduation ceremonies on May 2, 2026 🎓

sampleUtterances: When does the Fall 2025 semester start?
What is the midterm deadline for Fall 2025?
When are the final exams in Fall 2025?
What days is the university closed during Fall 2025?
Tell me Fall 2025 dates.
closingResponse:
📅 Fall 2025 Semester — University of the Cumberlands
👉 Classes begin on August 25, 2025
👉 University closed for Labor Day on September 1, 2025
👉 Midterm grades due by October 10, 2025
👉 Thanksgiving Break: November 24–28, 2025
👉 Campus closed on November 27–28, 2025
👉 Last day of classes: December 5, 2025
👉 Final exams: December 8–12, 2025
🎓👉 Fall Graduation: December 13, 2025

How do I contact the UC library?
closingResponse:
Thank you for chatting with me. Here are the current library hours at the Grover M. Hermann Library, University of the Cumberlands for this academic term:
• Monday – Thursday: 7:45 PM – 10:00 PM
• Friday: 7:45 AM – 5:00 PM
• Saturday: 11:00 AM – 5:00 PM
• Sunday: 3:00 PM – Closing time not specified
For the most accurate and up-to-date schedule (especially during holidays or breaks), I recommend checking the official UC Library website or the LibGuides page.
